name: AVPortraitEffectsMatte
desc: An auxiliary image used to separate foreground from background with high resolution.

items.name: init(fromDictionaryRepresentation: [AnyHashable : Any])
items.desc: Initializes a portrait effects matte instance from auxiliary image information in an image file.

items.name: func applyingExifOrientation(CGImagePropertyOrientation) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a derivative portrait effects matte after applying the specified EXIF orientation.

items.name: func replacingPortraitEffectsMatte(with: CVPixelBuffer) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a portrait effects matte by wrapping the replacement pixel buffer.

items.name: var mattingImage: CVPixelBuffer
items.desc: The portrait effects matte's internal image, formatted as a pixel buffer.

items.name: var pixelFormatType: OSType
items.desc: The pixel format type of this portrait effects matte's internal image.

items.name: func dictionaryRepresentation(forAuxiliaryDataType: AutoreleasingUnsafeMutablePointer<NSString?>?) -> [AnyHashable : Any]?
items.desc: A dictionary of primitive map information used for writing an image file with a portrait effects matte.
